I cant even return the product because I discarded the packaging.  Total waste of money very inferior plastic used and the product image completely misleading the customer. title: 'N/A'
body: The hunt for an easy way of mopping my apartment led me to this compact mop. Although it does what I wanted it to do,\xa0I'm only giving it\xa0four stars as I do not believe the quality is all that great.  Overall Performance (4/5): This mop is practical and does its job nicely. It's been a useful tool for\xa0cleaning my small apartment. Its narrow\xa0shape and the fact that it does not need a bucket,\xa0make it easy to use in small spaces.  Build Quality (3/5): Yes, it works, it will do its job, but I do not think that it will last long due to its quality. The individual parts appear to\xa0be\xa0very cheap, and I have some reservations about how this mop will continue to hold up over time. When I was putting it together, I kept feeling like I was going to snap it. It is not very sturdy. However, This is not a deal-breaker for me since I'm moving soon and won't be keeping it for long.  Longevity Thoughts (3/5): If you're looking for a cleaning solution that's going to last, I don't think this is it. I am moving soon, and it is cheaper than Swift and other brands, so I really did not need something to last, but if you do, I would probably steer away.  In conclusion, this lightweight mop effectively cleans up spills, dust, messes, and what have you, and it should be fine\xa0for temporary use. However, if you're looking for something that will last longer and be more reliable, you may want to consider spending a little more money.
